column1: Uchi////A tasting menu happy hour? Yes
column2: please! The happy hour menu offers a limited selection of some of Uchi's best dishes. Pricing is reasonable and the dishes are great for sharing. My happy hour crew often orders several things for the table
column3: tapas style. Service is always excellent and the vibe is vibin'
column4: as they say (They being young folks who know how to appropriately use the word "vibin'").
